mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DEID, t11.DENAME, t1.ISRAWMODE, t1.MEMO, t1.QMVERSION, t1.QUERYMODELID, t1.QUERYMODELNAME, t1.QUERYOBJECT, t1.SELECTMODE, t1.SELECTORDER, t1.SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFQUERYMODEL t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID WHERE ( t1.DEID = #{srf.datacontext.deid} )

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DEID`, t11.`DENAME`, t1.`ISRAWMODE`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`QMVERSION`, t1.`QUERYMODELID`, t1.`QUERYMODELNAME`, t1.`QUERYOBJECT`, t1.`SELECTMODE`, t1.`SELECTORDER`, t1.`SRFSYSPUB`, t1.`SRFUSERPUB`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_QUERYMODEL` t1 LEFT JOIN T_dataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID WHERE ( t1.`DEID` = #{srf.datacontext.deid} )
